title: PLAT V, L4 Duo partner to climb to diamond

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body: Hey all, tired of grinding solo queue without any consistant teamates, i main mid, can do alright at jg and support, but lacking in adc or top lane so probaly looking for a good adc main to duo with. Mained anivia since season 1, very rare to lose lane as her if i get mid :) someone come carry me haha, want to hit diamond 5 before years end

replies.body:
Hi there adc main and support 
add me
IGN:alexnamikaze
i'd carry you to diamond but viktor is banned 24/7 now so cya!
he is haha, but dont need a mid laner in any case
